text: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُفْلِحِينَ

translation.en.sahih: But as for one who had repented, believed, and done righteousness, it is promised by Allah that he will be among the successful.
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun orang yang bertaubat dan beriman, serta mengerjakan amal yang saleh, semoga dia termasuk orang-orang yang beruntung.
